parameters:
\nc<Logistics Company Employee>I'm deep in thought right now, so could you please not talk
to me?
\nc<Logistics Company Employee>I'm sleepy... I need coffee.
\nc<Logistics Company Employee>I'm busy right now, so please go over there.

\nc<Employee 1>Sigh. By the way, have you seen the experimental results
passed on from...? It's completely... you know. At this
rate, it'll take a bit more time to achieve our initial
goal...

\nc<Employee 2>The decision made by... is definitely... The virus's... is
still not at the completion stage...

\nc<Employee 1>We've decided to deliver it through... but the lack of... is
a problem... It's also affecting our research plan...

\nc<Employee 2>The... through... is going well, so don't worry. If we keep
this up, we should smoothly reach... before...

\nc<Employee 1>As expected, we do need.... We have to prepare... through
other means if necessary...

\nc<>It seems like certain words are obscured by noise and can't
be made out.

\nc<Employee 2>It seems certain. Especially since... is exactly what we
intended. However, if they keep coming every weekend, we'll
need to find a... method...
\nc<Employee 1>Hm? No, it might actually be convenient.

\nc<Employee 1>We have a favor to ask of you, you'll return the 'favor,'
won't you?

\nc<Employee 1>Hehe, very well... Then, next time... if... does..., it
will...
\nc<Employee 1>You understand, don't you? Please listen to... doing...
\nc<Employee 1>That's how you can repay our favor.

\nc<Employee 1>It's quite deep..., rather difficult. But still, the message
has been conveyed, hasn't it?

\nc<Employee 1>*sigh* By the way, have you seen the... that was handed over
from... this time? It's completely... you know. At this
rate, it'll take a bit more time until...

\nc<Employee 2>...so we decided to... with... but there's not enough... and
that's a problem. It's also affecting the... of...
\nc<>I was told that the break room is free for anyone to use...

\nc<>It seems this company has similar circumstances to ours...
Nothing was there.
\nc<> Gained a [Magic Capsule (Medium)]!... Why is it even here?
